headline: This Dividend Stock Had a Record Q3: Is It Too Late to Buy After the 40% YTD Surge?
summary: Citigroup is not only outperforming its large banking peers this year but also has among the highest dividend yields. Is the stock a buy despite the YTD rally?

raw.headline: This Dividend Stock Had a Record Q3: Is It Too Late to Buy After the 40% YTD Surge?
raw.summary: Citigroup is not only outperforming its large banking peers this year but also has among the highest dividend yields. Is the stock a buy despite the YTD rally?

headline: Finance Sector Provides Flying Start to Q3 Earnings Season
summary: American Express was the latest Finance player to beat Q3 expectations, offering positive, reassuring commentary on consumer health and the economy. These results echoed the same sentiment that we heard from the big banks.

raw.headline: Finance Sector Provides Flying Start to Q3 Earnings Season

headline: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser Named Chair, Reuniting Roles at the Bank
summary: The move, which combines roles that were separate for nearly two decades, reflects steps to ensure leadership continuity atop the New York bank, Citigroup said.

raw.headline: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser Named Chair, Reuniting Roles at the Bank
raw.summary: The move, which combines roles that were separate for nearly two decades, reflects steps to ensure leadership continuity atop the New York bank, Citigroup said.

headline: Jane Fraser Elected Chair of Citi’s Board of Directors
summary: NEW YORK, October 22, 2025--Citi today announced that its Board of Directors has elected Jane Fraser, Citi’s Chief Executive Officer, as Chair of the Board. John Dugan, who served as Chair of Citi’s Board since 2019, will become Lead Independent Director.

raw.headline: Jane Fraser Elected Chair of Citi’s Board of Directors
raw.summary: NEW YORK, October 22, 2025--Citi today announced that its Board of Directors has elected Jane Fraser, Citi’s Chief Executive Officer, as Chair of the Board. John Dugan, who served as Chair of Citi’s Board since 2019, will become Lead Independent Director.

headline: Bank ETFs in Red Over the Past Month: Pain or Gain Ahead? (Revised)
summary: Bank ETFs like IYG, IYF, KBWB, XLF and VFH dip on credit jitters. Are gains ahead as Q3 earnings & a steepening yield curve offer hope?

headline: Citibank is Ranked No. 1 Among Banks in Singapore for Total Experience in Report by Independent Research Firm
summary: Citibank was ranked first out of six banks in the inaugural Singapore total customer experience score rankings, 2025 report by global research and advisory firm Forrester.

summary: Better-than-expected results from big banks lift S&P 500 EPS growth for Q3 2025 to 8.5%.
